charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was outside with
Sina, who had insisted that [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] accompany her.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1101_0200_2:
Sina had chosen [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] as her training partner and
would not let [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] leave until she was satisfied.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_0300_1:
The way you battle is magnificent! So fierce and
yet so elegant.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_0400_1:
You know, I invited you to train with me today for
a number of reasons, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_0500_1:
Firstly, I wanted to learn more about how you and
your partner operate as a sync pair.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_0600_1:
After sparring for a bit, I’ve come to appreciate
the beauty of your skills.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_0700_1: As well as your mind, of course.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_0800_1:
My second reason for inviting you was to learn
more about sync stones.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_0900_1:
Back in Kalos, Trainers can equip something called
a Key Stone...
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_1000_1:
which will react to the strong bonds they share
with their Pokémon to trigger Mega Evolution.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_1100_1: On Pasio, sync stones enable Mega Evolution...
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_1200_1:
and they also make it possible to use sync moves,
which are similar to Alola’s Z-Moves.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_1300_1:
If you think about it, sync stones are converting
the bonds between Trainers and their Pokémon
into energy.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_1400_1:
That would explain how they make it possible to
use Mega Evolution or unleash special moves!
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_0301_1500_1: You sound like a true researcher!
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_0302_1700_1: You got all that from our battle?!
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_0402_1800_1: Haha! No need to be so shocked!
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_1900_1:
I used to research all kinds of things with Glaceon
and Dexio, you know.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2000_1:
And we helped out young Trainers even as we
researched.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2100_1:
People and Pokémon need to support one another,
after all.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2200_1:
Glaceon and I have been working together since
even before we came to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2300_1:
She’s an excellent partner who always
understands how I’m feeling.
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2400_1:
I had one more reason for inviting you to train
with me. Care to guess?
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2500_1:
The answer, of course, is to stimulate further
growth for me and Glaceon!
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2600_1:
I hope we’ll have the chance to spar with many
other sync pairs!
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2700_1:
New encounters help people and Pokémon grow
and mature!
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2800_1:
By exploring a place as novel as Pasio with
Glaceon and Dexio...
charaepi_ch0187_00_sina/2301_1201_2900_1:
I hope we’ll open up a brand-new world the likes
of which we’ve never seen before!
